                <blockquote>Pinky</blockquote>       

                <blockquote>Inky</blockquote>       

                <blockquote>Clyde</blockquote>       
    

blockquote::before {   
  content: '"';
}

blockquote::after {
  content: '"';
}
Character Nickname
- Shadow
Blinky
- Speedy
Pinky
- Bashful
Inky
- Pokey
Clyde
neutral, vertical, straight, typewriter, dumb or ASCII quotation marks
